topics.body:
Hey guys, anyone check up on world news recently? More crap happening to people around the world, usually getting worse. 

Africa is now looking pretty screwed with the Ebola being spread about. 

ISIS in Iraq going around murdering and raping Kurdish people is also kind of shitty, since the UN doesn't seem able to do much. 

Also I got to ask, what does everyone think of giving refugees emergency visas to avoid being slaughtered like those in Iraq? Is it a priority above all else? Or should we wait and watch to see what happens.
